law.catch_line: The legislative body of each municipal corporation may adopt an ordinance for the licensing, control...

text.section: The legislative body of each municipal corporation may adopt an ordinance for the licensing, control, location, or maintenance within its jurisdiction of a business establishment that allows on its premises any activity involving nudity and sexual displays listed in Article 2B, § 10-405(c) through (f) of the Code.

section.section: A person who violates an ordinance adopted under this section is guilty of a misdemeanor and on conviction is subject to imprisonment not exceeding 6 months and a fine of not less than $500.
Each day on which a violation continues is a separate offense.
